snippet: The most successful investors in restaurants consider how a style fits an area and track who their customers are, said Hudson Riehle of the National Restaurant Association.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column offers advice on how to profitably invest in the restaurant industry, which is widely associated with high risk; notes that location and customer tracking are key elements to success.
lead_paragraph: The most successful investors in restaurants consider how a style fits an area and track who their customers are, said Hudson Riehle of the National Restaurant Association.

headline.print_headline: Investing in Restaurants Can Work, but It’s Not as Easy as Pie
headline.seo: A Tip for Restaurant Investors: Study the Demographics
headline.main: Investing in Restaurants Can Work, but It’s Not as Easy as Pie
